MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in Mill Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 11PM. Our engineers have arrived on site at Mill Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2AM. If this information changes we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:53PM on 15 November 2020.
